A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Goes in the opposite way a lot of people thought it would. Visually stunning. Has some blatant plot holes. Great acting performances from Mark Hamill. The decision they made with Luke weee controversial\, but made sense if you take the time to think about it. Has some HUGE surprises. All in all a good movie that could've been great if they had worked out some of those plot problems. I would've given it 4 stars but the Rose and Fin story arc made me drop it a half.
